ocil:boolean_question.ocil:question_text:
To determine if the system is configured to audit calls to the setxattr system call, run the following command: $ sudo grep "setxattr" /etc/audit/audit.* If the system is configured to audit this activity, it will return a line.
Is it the case that no line is returned?

Verify that Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS 4 is configured to audit the execution of the "newgrp" command with the following command:
